page.title: 11INGRAM SHOW
page.content: Ingram show takes place every year in early to mid September.Although Ingram is a tiny place ,the show is very important to the surrounding area.It is primarily an agricultural show.The main classes are the following. (a)sheep (b)sheep dog trials (c)pony trials (d)horticulture (e)cookery (f)school classes (g)sports There are usually refreshments on sale,as well as a beer tent.Judging is usually done by members of the local community.Cups are awarded in each class.There is usually a disco at night in the show field.
